timeline.bodyText:
Suggesting Google naming convention: timestamp fields ending with _time. Could you make sure other PR's follow this convention for consistency also

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              @Column(
          
          
            
                  name = "created",
          
          
            
                  insertable = false,
          
          
            
                  updatable = false,
          
          
            
                  columnDefinition = "TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP")
          
          
            
              private Timestamp created;
          
          
            
              @Column(
          
          
            
                  name = "created_time",
          
          
            
                  insertable = false,
          
          
            
                  updatable = false,
          
          
            
                  columnDefinition = "TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP")
          
          
            
              private Timestamp createdTime;
timeline.author: saminguyen

replies.bodyText: We named the fields as created_timestamp, modified_timestamp in earlier PR's but Zohreh suggested us to rename the fields to created, modified for timestamp. We'll be using created and modified for consistency.
replies.author: Kantharajut-btc

timeline.author: saminguyen

timeline.bodyText: What is the Integer value supposed to represent here? We need a better name for this field.
timeline.author: saminguyen

replies.bodyText: @Kantharajut-btc I saw that you have changed this field to boolean. I just wanted to understand the meaning for this field and why we are keeping track of it. I saw this field included in the ERD in the tech design doc, but not any mention of why we are keeping track of this value specifically for UR admins?
replies.author: saminguyen

replies.bodyText: This column will maintain the track of registered email id modified
replies.author: Kantharajut-btc

timeline.bodyText: Change column name to can_edit, too
